author: MWPatterson2000
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

When a user who is a Global Reader or Security Reader tries to connect to SPO with Connect-SPOService, it will not connect, this requires the user to be a SharePoint Admin.  It would be nice to allow this to minimize the rights required to allow reporting on SPO & OneDrive
